list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add conditional build logic to deployment workflow
Adds a check to skip Docker build and push steps if no changes are detected in the service path. Updates `.github/workflows/deploy.yml` for improved CI/CD efficiency.

task.summary:
Add initial React web app setup with Tailwind, Flowbite, Next.js, and configuration files
Includes base `.gitignore`, `.prettier{rc,ignore}`, ESLint configuration, initial Next.js setup with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Flowbite React integration. Adds basic app structure, layout, and necessary assets.

Update Filters component with new icon imports and replacements
Replaced outdated icons with new imports from `react-icons`. Cleaned up unused imports, ensuring consistency in design elements.
Add ESLint disable comment to fix useEffect dependency warning in Search component

Add NextAuth.js authentication with IdentityServer integration
Integrates NextAuth.js into the frontend for authentication using IdentityServer. Adds SignIn and session management features, with session callbacks for token handling. Updates backend IdentityService with token and claim configuration. Includes adjustments across middleware, NavBar, and action components to support user sessions and secure API requests.

Add auction creation, update, and delete workflows with detailed views
Implements auction creation, update, and delete functionality in the frontend, including `AuctionForm` component, `DeleteButton`, and detailed view pages. Adds routing for auction operations, introduces reusable components `Input` and `DateInput`, and centralizes API logic with `fetchWrapper`. Integrates React Hook Form, DatePicker, and toast notifications for enhanced user interaction.

Add bidding functionality and real-time notifications for auctions
Implements bid management in the frontend with a `useBidStore` Zustand store, `BidList`, and `BidForm` components. Integrates real-time bid updates and auction notifications using SignalR. Enhances auction details view, adds high bid tracking, and updates UI with components for current bids and auction states. Refactors layout for SignalR provider and adds dependencies (`@microsoft/signalr`, `date-fns`).

Add support for production-ready authentication, configuration, and deployment settings
Integrates environment-based settings for IdentityServer and frontend, enabling dynamic URLs and credentials. Refactors authentication flow with NextAuth.js session handling, backend configuration updates, and secure SSL certificates. Adds Dockerized builds for web and services with Nginx proxy support for streamlined deployment.

Add script to generate Kubernetes TLS secret for DriveBid app
Adds `create-k8s-secret.sh` to simplify the creation of Kubernetes TLS secrets using provided key and certificate files. Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect recent changes.

Secure configuration management using Kubernetes secrets
Replaces hardcoded sensitive data in deployment manifests with Kubernetes secrets. Updates services (e.g., RabbitMQ, MongoDB, PostgreSQL) to fetch credentials dynamically. Adjusts environment variable configurations across deployments for enhanced security.

Add services to deployment workflow for CI/CD
Includes SearchService, IdentityService, GatewayService, BiddingService, NotificationService, and WebApp in deployment pipeline.

Add conditional build logic to deployment workflow
Adds a check to skip Docker build and push steps if no changes are detected in the service path. Updates `.github/workflows/deploy.yml` for improved CI/CD efficiency.

MESSAGE.value:
Add initial React web app setup with Tailwind, Flowbite, Next.js, and configuration files
Includes base `.gitignore`, `.prettier{rc,ignore}`, ESLint configuration, initial Next.js setup with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Flowbite React integration. Adds basic app structure, layout, and necessary assets.

Update Filters component with new icon imports and replacements
Replaced outdated icons with new imports from `react-icons`. Cleaned up unused imports, ensuring consistency in design elements.
Add ESLint disable comment to fix useEffect dependency warning in Search component

Add NextAuth.js authentication with IdentityServer integration
Integrates NextAuth.js into the frontend for authentication using IdentityServer. Adds SignIn and session management features, with session callbacks for token handling. Updates backend IdentityService with token and claim configuration. Includes adjustments across middleware, NavBar, and action components to support user sessions and secure API requests.

Add auction creation, update, and delete workflows with detailed views
Implements auction creation, update, and delete functionality in the frontend, including `AuctionForm` component, `DeleteButton`, and detailed view pages. Adds routing for auction operations, introduces reusable components `Input` and `DateInput`, and centralizes API logic with `fetchWrapper`. Integrates React Hook Form, DatePicker, and toast notifications for enhanced user interaction.

Add bidding functionality and real-time notifications for auctions
Implements bid management in the frontend with a `useBidStore` Zustand store, `BidList`, and `BidForm` components. Integrates real-time bid updates and auction notifications using SignalR. Enhances auction details view, adds high bid tracking, and updates UI with components for current bids and auction states. Refactors layout for SignalR provider and adds dependencies (`@microsoft/signalr`, `date-fns`).
Add production-ready authentication and deployment updates, including environment-specific configurations, dynamic URLs, backend improvements, and Dockerized builds with Nginx proxy support.
Add production-ready authentication and deployment updates, including environment-specific configurations, dynamic URLs, backend improvements, and Dockerized builds with Nginx proxy support.
Remove Kubernetes manifests for all services and related configurations

Add script to generate Kubernetes TLS secret for DriveBid app
Adds `create-k8s-secret.sh` to simplify the creation of Kubernetes TLS secrets using provided key and certificate files. Updates `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect recent changes.

Secure configuration management using Kubernetes secrets
Replaces hardcoded sensitive data in deployment manifests with Kubernetes secrets. Updates services (e.g., RabbitMQ, MongoDB, PostgreSQL) to fetch credentials dynamically. Adjusts environment variable configurations across deployments for enhanced security.

Add services to deployment workflow for CI/CD
Includes SearchService, IdentityService, GatewayService, BiddingService, NotificationService, and WebApp in deployment pipeline.

Add conditional build logic to deployment workflow
Adds a check to skip Docker build and push steps if no changes are detected in the service path. Updates `.github/workflows/deploy.yml` for improved CI/CD efficiency.
